location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 8/4 of 1873 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, on special duty East African Special Mission, on board HMSG Enchantress to Lieutenant Colonel Edward Charles Ross, HBM's acting Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of Ross's letter dated 8 February 1873 and forwarding copies of the documents requested.
